00016 BOOLEAN STCILoadRGB( HIMAGE hImage, UINT16 fContents, HWFILE hFile, STCIHeader * pHeader );
00017 BOOLEAN STCILoadIndexed( HIMAGE hImage, UINT16 fContents, HWFILE hFile, STCIHeader * pHeader );

00020 BOOLEAN LoadSTCIFileToImage( HIMAGE hImage, UINT16 fContents )
00021 {
00022       HWFILE                  hFile;
00023       STCIHeader  Header;
00024       UINT32                  uiBytesRead;
00025       image_type  TempImage;
00026 
00027       // Check that hImage is valid, and that the file in question exists
00028       Assert( hImage != NULL );
00029 
00030       TempImage = *hImage;
00031 
00032       CHECKF( FileExists( TempImage.ImageFile ) );
00033 
00034       // Open the file and read the header
00035       hFile = FileOpen( TempImage.ImageFile, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00036       CHECKF( hFile );
00037 
00038       if (!FileRead( hFile, &Header, STCI_HEADER_SIZE, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != STCI_HEADER_SIZE || memcmp( Header.cID, STCI_ID_STRING, STCI_ID_LEN ) != 0 )
00039       {
00040             DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem reading STCI header." );
00041             FileClose( hFile );
00042             return( FALSE );
00043       }
00044 
00045       // Determine from the header the data stored in the file. and run the appropriate loader
00046       if (Header.fFlags & STCI_RGB)
00047       {
00048             if( !STCILoadRGB( &TempImage, fContents, hFile, &Header ) )
00049             {
00050                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem loading RGB image." );
00051                   FileClose( hFile );
00052                   return( FALSE );
00053             }
00054       }
00055       else if (Header.fFlags & STCI_INDEXED)
00056       {
00057             if( !STCILoadIndexed( &TempImage, fContents, hFile, &Header ) )
00058             {
00059                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem loading palettized image." );
00060                   FileClose( hFile );
00061                   return( FALSE );
00062             }
00063       }
00064       else
00065       {     // unsupported type of data, or the right flags weren't set!
00066             DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Unknown data organization in STCI file." );
00067             FileClose( hFile );
00068             return( FALSE );
00069       }
00070 
00071       // Requested data loaded successfully.
00072       FileClose( hFile );
00073 
00074       // Set some more flags in the temporary image structure, copy it so that hImage points
00075       // to it, and return.
00076       if (Header.fFlags & STCI_ZLIB_COMPRESSED)
00077       {
00078             TempImage.fFlags |= IMAGE_COMPRESSED;
00079       }
00080       TempImage.usWidth = Header.usWidth;
00081       TempImage.usHeight = Header.usHeight;
00082       TempImage.ubBitDepth = Header.ubDepth;
00083       *hImage = TempImage;
00084 
00085       return( TRUE );         
00086 }
00087 
00088 BOOLEAN STCILoadRGB( HIMAGE hImage, UINT16 fContents, HWFILE hFile, STCIHeader * pHeader )
00089 {
00090       UINT32                  uiBytesRead;
00091 
00092       if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE && !(fContents & IMAGE_ALLIMAGEDATA))
00093       { // RGB doesn't have a palette!
00094             return( FALSE );
00095       }
00096       
00097       if (fContents & IMAGE_BITMAPDATA)
00098       { 
00099             // Allocate memory for the image data and read it in
00100             hImage->pImageData =    MemAlloc( pHeader->uiStoredSize );
00101             if (hImage->pImageData == NULL)
00102             {
00103                   return( FALSE );
00104             }
00105             else if (!FileRead( hFile, hImage->pImageData, pHeader->uiStoredSize, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != pHeader->uiStoredSize)
00106             { 
00107                   MemFree( hImage->pImageData );
00108                   return( FALSE );
00109             }
00110 
00111             hImage->fFlags |= IMAGE_BITMAPDATA;
00112 
00113             if( pHeader->ubDepth == 16)
00114             {
00115                   // ASSUMPTION: file data is 565 R,G,B
00116 
00117                   if (gusRedMask != (UINT16) pHeader->RGB.uiRedMask || gusGreenMask != (UINT16) pHeader->RGB.uiGreenMask || gusBlueMask != (UINT16) pHeader->RGB.uiBlueMask )
00118                   {
00119                         // colour distribution of the file is different from hardware!  We have to change it!
00120                         DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Converting to current RGB distribution!" );
00121                         // Convert the image to the current hardware's specifications
00122                         if (gusRedMask > gusGreenMask && gusGreenMask > gusBlueMask)
00123                         {
00124                               // hardware wants RGB!
00125                               if (gusRedMask == 0x7C00 && gusGreenMask == 0x03E0 && gusBlueMask == 0x001F)
00126                               {     // hardware is 555
00127                                     ConvertRGBDistribution565To555( hImage->p16BPPData, pHeader->usWidth * pHeader->usHeight );
00128                                     return( TRUE );
00129                               }
00130                               else if (gusRedMask == 0xFC00 && gusGreenMask == 0x03E0 && gusBlueMask == 0x001F)
00131                               {
00132                                     ConvertRGBDistribution565To655( hImage->p16BPPData, pHeader->usWidth * pHeader->usHeight );
00133                                     return( TRUE );
00134                               }
00135                               else if (gusRedMask == 0xF800 && gusGreenMask == 0x07C0 && gusBlueMask == 0x003F)
00136                               {
00137                                     ConvertRGBDistribution565To556( hImage->p16BPPData, pHeader->usWidth * pHeader->usHeight );
00138                                     return( TRUE );
00139                               }
00140                               else 
00141                               {
00142                                     // take the long route
00143                                     ConvertRGBDistribution565ToAny( hImage->p16BPPData, pHeader->usWidth * pHeader->usHeight );
00144                                     return( TRUE );
00145                               }
00146                         }
00147                         else
00148                         {
00149                               // hardware distribution is not R-G-B so we have to take the long route!
00150                               ConvertRGBDistribution565ToAny( hImage->p16BPPData, pHeader->usWidth * pHeader->usHeight );
00151                               return( TRUE );
00152                         }
00153                   }
00154             }
00155       }
00156 #ifdef JA2  
00157       return( TRUE );
00158 #else
00159 // Anything else is an ERROR! --DB
00160       return(FALSE);
00161 #endif
00162 }

00165 BOOLEAN STCILoadIndexed( HIMAGE hImage, UINT16 fContents, HWFILE hFile, STCIHeader * pHeader )
00166 {
00167       UINT32                  uiFileSectionSize;
00168       UINT32                  uiBytesRead;
00169       PTR                           pSTCIPalette;
00170 
00171       if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE)
00172       { // Allocate memory for reading in the palette
00173             if (pHeader->Indexed.uiNumberOfColours != 256)
00174             { 
00175                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Palettized image has bad palette size." );
00176                   return( FALSE );
00177             }
00178             uiFileSectionSize = pHeader->Indexed.uiNumberOfColours * STCI_PALETTE_ELEMENT_SIZE;
00179             pSTCIPalette = MemAlloc( uiFileSectionSize );
00180             if (pSTCIPalette == NULL)
00181             {
00182                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Out of memory!" );
00183                   FileClose( hFile );
00184                   return( FALSE );
00185             }
00186 
00187             // ATE: Memset: Jan 16/99
00188             memset( pSTCIPalette, 0, uiFileSectionSize );
00189 
00190             // Read in the palette
00191             if (!FileRead( hFile, pSTCIPalette, uiFileSectionSize, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != uiFileSectionSize)
00192             {
00193                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem loading palette!" );
00194                   FileClose( hFile );
00195                   MemFree( pSTCIPalette );
00196                   return( FALSE );
00197             }
00198             else if (!STCISetPalette( pSTCIPalette, hImage ))
00199             {
00200                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem setting hImage-format palette!" );
00201                   FileClose( hFile );
00202                   MemFree( pSTCIPalette );
00203                   return( FALSE );  
00204             }
00205             hImage->fFlags |= IMAGE_PALETTE;
00206             // Free the temporary buffer
00207             MemFree( pSTCIPalette );
00208       }
00209       else if (fContents & (IMAGE_BITMAPDATA | IMAGE_APPDATA))
00210       { // seek past the palette
00211             uiFileSectionSize = pHeader->Indexed.uiNumberOfColours * STCI_PALETTE_ELEMENT_SIZE;
00212             if (FileSeek( hFile, uiFileSectionSize, FILE_SEEK_FROM_CURRENT) == FALSE)
00213             {
00214                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem seeking past palette!" );
00215                   FileClose( hFile );
00216                   return( FALSE );  
00217             }
00218       }
00219       if (fContents & IMAGE_BITMAPDATA)
00220       {     
00221             if (pHeader->fFlags & STCI_ETRLE_COMPRESSED)
00222             {
00223                   // load data for the subimage (object) structures
00224                   Assert( sizeof( ETRLEObject ) == STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE );
00225                   hImage->usNumberOfObjects = pHeader->Indexed.usNumberOfSubImages;
00226                   uiFileSectionSize = hImage->usNumberOfObjects * STCI_SUBIMAGE_SIZE;
00227                   hImage->pETRLEObject = (ETRLEObject *) MemAlloc( uiFileSectionSize );
00228                   if (hImage->pETRLEObject == NULL)
00229                   {
00230                         DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Out of memory!" );
00231                         FileClose( hFile );
00232                         if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE) 
00233                         {
00234                               MemFree( hImage->pPalette );
00235                         }
00236                         return( FALSE );
00237                   }
00238                   if (!FileRead( hFile, hImage->pETRLEObject, uiFileSectionSize, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != uiFileSectionSize)
00239                   { 
00240                         DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Error loading subimage structures!" );
00241                         FileClose( hFile );
00242                         if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE) 
00243                         {
00244                               MemFree( hImage->pPalette );
00245                         }
00246                         MemFree( hImage->pETRLEObject );
00247                         return( FALSE );
00248                   }
00249                   hImage->uiSizePixData = pHeader->uiStoredSize;
00250                   hImage->fFlags |= IMAGE_TRLECOMPRESSED;
00251             }
00252             // allocate memory for and read in the image data
00253             hImage->pImageData = MemAlloc( pHeader->uiStoredSize );
00254             if (hImage->pImageData == NULL)
00255             {
00256                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Out of memory!" );
00257                   FileClose( hFile );
00258                   if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE) 
00259                   {
00260                         MemFree( hImage->pPalette );
00261                   }
00262                   if (hImage->usNumberOfObjects > 0)
00263                   {
00264                         MemFree( hImage->pETRLEObject );
00265                   }
00266                   return( FALSE );
00267             }
00268             else if (!FileRead( hFile, hImage->pImageData, pHeader->uiStoredSize, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != pHeader->uiStoredSize)
00269             { // Problem reading in the image data!
00270                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Error loading image data!" );
00271                   FileClose( hFile );
00272                   MemFree( hImage->pImageData );
00273                   if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE) 
00274                   {
00275                         MemFree( hImage->pPalette );
00276                   }
00277                   if (hImage->usNumberOfObjects > 0)
00278                   {
00279                         MemFree( hImage->pETRLEObject );
00280                   }
00281                   return( FALSE );
00282             }
00283             hImage->fFlags |= IMAGE_BITMAPDATA;
00284       }
00285       else if (fContents & IMAGE_APPDATA) // then there's a point in seeking ahead
00286       {
00287             if (FileSeek( hFile, pHeader->uiStoredSize, FILE_SEEK_FROM_CURRENT) == FALSE)
00288             {
00289                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem seeking past image data!" );
00290                         FileClose( hFile );
00291                   return( FALSE );  
00292             }
00293       }
00294             
00295       if (fContents & IMAGE_APPDATA && pHeader->uiAppDataSize > 0)
00296       {
00297             // load application-specific data
00298             hImage->pAppData = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( pHeader->uiAppDataSize );
00299             if (hImage->pAppData == NULL)
00300             {
00301                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Out of memory!" );
00302                   FileClose( hFile );
00303                   MemFree( hImage->pAppData );
00304                   if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE) 
00305                   {
00306                         MemFree( hImage->pPalette );
00307                   }
00308                   if (fContents & IMAGE_BITMAPDATA)
00309                   {
00310                         MemFree( hImage->pImageData );
00311                   }
00312                   if (hImage->usNumberOfObjects > 0)
00313                   {
00314                         MemFree( hImage->pETRLEObject );
00315                   }
00316                   return( FALSE );
00317             }
00318             if (!FileRead( hFile, hImage->pAppData, pHeader->uiAppDataSize, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != pHeader->uiAppDataSize)
00319             { 
00320                   DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Error loading application-specific data!" );
00321                   FileClose( hFile );
00322                   MemFree( hImage->pAppData );
00323                   if (fContents & IMAGE_PALETTE) 
00324                   {
00325                         MemFree( hImage->pPalette );
00326                   }
00327                   if (fContents & IMAGE_BITMAPDATA)
00328                   {
00329                         MemFree( hImage->pImageData );
00330                   }
00331                   if (hImage->usNumberOfObjects > 0)
00332                   {
00333                         MemFree( hImage->pETRLEObject );
00334                   }
00335                   return( FALSE );
00336             }
00337             hImage->uiAppDataSize = pHeader->uiAppDataSize;;
00338             hImage->fFlags |= IMAGE_APPDATA;
00339       }
00340       else
00341       {
00342             hImage->pAppData = NULL;
00343             hImage->uiAppDataSize = 0;
00344       }
00345       return( TRUE );
00346 }

00349 BOOLEAN STCISetPalette( PTR pSTCIPalette, HIMAGE hImage )
00350 {
00351       UINT16                                                usIndex;
00352       STCIPaletteElement *    pubPalette;
00353 
00354       pubPalette = (STCIPaletteElement *) pSTCIPalette;
00355 
00356       // Allocate memory for palette
00357       hImage->pPalette = (SGPPaletteEntry *) MemAlloc( sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * 256 );
00358       memset( hImage->pPalette, 0, ( sizeof( SGPPaletteEntry ) * 256 ) );
00359 
00360       if ( hImage->pPalette == NULL )
00361       {
00362             return( FALSE );
00363       }
00364 
00365   // Initialize the proper palette entries
00366   for (usIndex = 0; usIndex < 256; usIndex++)
00367   { 
00368             hImage->pPalette[ usIndex ].peRed   = pubPalette->ubRed;
00369             hImage->pPalette[ usIndex ].peGreen = pubPalette->ubGreen;
00370     hImage->pPalette[ usIndex ].peBlue  = pubPalette->ubBlue;
00371     hImage->pPalette[ usIndex ].peFlags = 0;
00372             pubPalette ++;
00373   }
00374   return TRUE;
00375 }

00378 BOOLEAN IsSTCIETRLEFile( CHAR8 * ImageFile )
00379 {
00380       HWFILE            hFile;
00381       STCIHeader  Header;
00382       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00383 
00384       CHECKF( FileExists( ImageFile ) );
00385 
00386       // Open the file and read the header
00387       hFile = FileOpen( ImageFile, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00388       CHECKF( hFile );
00389 
00390       if (!FileRead( hFile, &Header, STCI_HEADER_SIZE, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != STCI_HEADER_SIZE || memcmp( Header.cID, STCI_ID_STRING, STCI_ID_LEN ) != 0 )
00391       {
00392             DbgMessage( TOPIC_HIMAGE, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Problem reading STCI header." );
00393             FileClose( hFile );
00394             return( FALSE );
00395       }
00396       FileClose( hFile );
00397       if (Header.fFlags & STCI_ETRLE_COMPRESSED)
00398       {
00399           return( TRUE );
00400       }
00401       else
00402       {
00403           return( FALSE );
00404       }
00405 }
